website_summaries.verdict: A pharmaceutical-grade magnesium sulfate that meets U.S. Pharmacopeia (USP) standards.
pros: Medium grain size dissolves quickly in the bath
Doesn't contain any added ingredients like fragrance, which can irritate sensitive skin and allows users to customize their own scents using essential oils
cons: Despite the name, it’s not organic

website_summaries.verdict: Pharmaceutical-grade formula with no fragrances or additives.
pros: The 5-pound bag will last a long time
Users love the quick-dissolving, medium-grain salts
Totally odorless and natural, it is made without added fragrance or colors
A great option for those who want a simple and natural Epsom salt
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Like heaven for your garden!!!  Will use year after year from now on!
customer_reviews.text: The best year of Tomatoes EVER. 100% pure epsom salt in the soil and bi-weekly sprinkled onto the tomato plants was caused my garden to EXPLODE with massive tomatoes and peppers. I would DEFINITELY use this product again. I only wish it same in a larger bag size, 25lbs. would be great. 1 tbsp in a gallon of water every two weeks and 3 tbsp into the soil mixed with crushed egg shells was MAGIC!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Eiting

customer_reviews.title: Non-gmo & not from China!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this Epsom salt is natural, non-gmo and not from China!! Nothing added. I use it for Epsom salt baths which help with detoxing. If you’re trying to detox your body, you don’t want anything in your salt adding toxins back into your body! This is great stuff and I will continue to purchase just as long as they keep making an amazing, natural product!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Love it, seems to work better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Love it, seems to work better than other brands. Beside that it is safe to take internally, it is food grade.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Lacendar scented but doesn't say it is
customer_reviews.text: This product has a lavender scent. Neither the package or the Amazon description mentions. Product not as described and worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: eric m doyle

customer_reviews.title: ... tried other epson salt but this one is the best i have used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other epson salt but this one is the best i have used!! I do triathlons so usually have some need for soaking and relaxing my muscles. I used this product on the same day i received it. It was wonderful and the salt dissolved faster than others i have used. I really like knowing that it is pure and natural. Highly recommend this product.!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Culler

customer_reviews.title: So glad to have found this
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible!! I definitely will buy this product and from this seller again!!! So glad to have found this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sillychick

customer_reviews.title: Very worthwhile product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to have found this product. My new residence doesn't allow me any control over softening the hard water and so this product, when used as an additive to shower gel, greatly helps my skin feel the way I'm used to having it feel during many years where I had soft water. Also experimented for the first time with pursuit of muscle pain relief from Epsom salts. I think I'm not so easy for this product, or any Epsom salts, to provide the relief suggested for aching muscles. I have fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Swensen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed + weird fragrance smell
customer_reviews.text: I chose to return this due to false labeling. I was expecting pure unadulterated Epsom salt but when I opened the package there was this very unpleasant fragrance... I have bought pure organic Epsom salt before from other companies and have never experienced that type of synthetic fragrance smell. Will not be purchasing again. Plus, kinda spendy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plants
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a foliage spray (when mixed with water) for the peppers that I am growing! Good, clean, product. 15/10 would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, and I am so appreciate of the email with all the DYI products you can make on your own. I love the way my skin feels and my muscles after a soak. I cant wait to dive into some of the scrubs, lotions, etc that I can make with these salts!!
customer_reviews.author: namaste norine

customer_reviews.title: Gimme Some Epsom
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves fast and leaves your skin feeling soft! I suffer from back pain and neck pain, so I got this to help relieve some of that pain. I haven't used it long enough to notice a difference, but no denying it offers a very soothing bath.
customer_reviews.author: Maki

customer_reviews.title: I love using this Epsom Salt in my detox bath
customer_reviews.text: I love using this Epsom Salt in my detox bath!! It dissolves quickly and I know it's not adding any harmful chemicals! I will definitely be getting more in the future. I also want to check out more products from f Sky Organics !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this to repel Raccoons.  But it doesn't that said it does good things for plants.
customer_reviews.text: I have two stay cats that I care for. I feed them in the morning and at night. But at night a Raccoon often shows up and steals the food. So I had read that Epsom would repel the Raccoons, but it doesn't. That said it is good for the plants you are growing, it enhances a plant's green color. That is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Friendly, Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a food grade epsom salt for a liver cleanse. This product seems to fit the bill perfectly and the seller was top notch in handling the order and shipping it out super quick. Thank you!! 🙌🏼🏔🎇💫💗
customer_reviews.author: C R Haeussler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely relaxing, (kills tree stumps too!)
customer_reviews.text: My initial reason for the purchase was because Bob Vila (builder extraordinaire) said if you drill holes in a tree stump and fill with Epsom Salt & some water and cover it so rain doesn't wash it out, the stump will die within a few months. Of course, I love it in my tub too!
customer_reviews.author: Dukeman

customer_reviews.title: Bag was busted... Salt everywhere and not the amount that should have been in the bag
customer_reviews.text: This package arrived with the bag split open... Half the salt had leaked out of the package and there was little to no stuffing and it was delivered in a box much too big for the item which is probably part of why it busted open. I returned to shipper :(
customer_reviews.author: Carl Nordberg

customer_reviews.title: I love epsom salt!
customer_reviews.text: I use epsom salt regularly when I soak in the bathtub or for a foot bath as it helps with my aches and pains. Also per naturopaths, it is good to detox the body when you soak. This product is very nice. I also use it in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Bath 🛀 Salts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my DIY bath salts and im very happy with the quality and the packaging. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Broken package, epsom salt spilling everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The package was broken so when I lifted the package out of the box it was spilling everywhere. I am not in a position to be able to box the item back up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Scam alert!!! 📢
customer_reviews.text: Scam alert!!!! This was supposed to be just Epsom salt. When it arrived, the bag was not fully sealed and spilled some. When I went to use it, it smelled SO STRONG like dollar tree bath salts. It was so highly fragranced that my husband could smell it from across the room when I opened the bag. What was in this bag is NOT what this listing says is in this bag!!! Save yourself $10 & go to Walmart to get feral Epsom salt!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Use it monthly for my son. He had a dental procedure so I wanted to detox him. It has no scents which is why I picked this one..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use Epsom salt often for my feet - per my doctor's instructions. This is very nice. I enjoyed reading about all of the other uses for the salt, and plan to try them all out.

customer_reviews.title: Gall Bladder Cleanse

I used it the day after I received it and I was vey happy with it. One of the more relaxing baths I've taken. I highly recommend this product.

product_meta.title: Epsom Salt by Sky Organics (5 lbs.) - 100% Pure Magnesium Sulfate USP Grade Kosher Non-GMO – Bath and Foot Soak Soothing Body Soak. Made in USA
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 5 lb. bag of Epsom Salt by Sky Organics, Medium grain Magnesium Sulfate.
Soothe Muscles and Skin: Use Sky Organics Epsom Salt as a comforting bath soak to comfort muscles after workouts, remove impurities, and unwind in the tub.
Easy to Use: Sky Organics Epsom Salt dissolves quickly in warm water so relaxation never has to wait!

Multipurpose: Use Sky Organic Epsom Salts to create your own DIY body scrubs, bath bombs, and more! Our Epsom Salts are also fragrance-free, making them easy to customize with your preferred essential oils.
Made in USA: Our Epsom Salt is GMO-free, Kosher, USP grade, vegan, and cruelty-free.
